author: Robert Böhm
comment: if you add google fit steps count and possibility show only temperature without conditions, i'll raise to 5 stars. ty guys
title: steps count

author: Neil Higgins
comment: Love it on my Huawei Watch 2

author: Matthew Bird
comment: Great but this watch face needs a lot of the same settings and features found in their weather watch face to start with, for example syncing with Google Fit as well as ability to switch of interactions..

reply.author: Wearable Designs
reply.content: Hello Matthew, we're working on getting those features in soon.

title: Good but improvement needed..

author: Zed
comment: I like this watch face, but it would be nice if we could change the "weather"/"steps" to something else like we can in "LED With weather"
title: Pretty great

author: Immanie Fikx
comment: The steps still show zero all day long. What's up with that?

reply.author: Wearable Designs
reply.content:
Hello Immanie, 

Sorry to hear you are having trouble, could you drop us an email to support@wearabledesigns.co.uk so we can assist you.

title: Why is the steps not reflecting
